modName: Master of Weapons - All in One 1-20
summary:
Combines all the MOW weapons in one.
One Download, One ESP.
So Neat!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/37623-0-1443334418.png[/img][/center]

[center]<<<PLEASE NOTE THERE ARE MANY MORE WEAPONS IN THE MOD THAN IN THE IMAGES>>>
SEE FULL LIST BELOW.


********** EDIT: 27/09/2015: Doulifee provided an update which makes tools "temperable" at a workbench. Yay! (see optional DLs)**********
**********Please Note: I am no longer working on this project, so no updates are promised from my side. Sorry, guys.**********
[size=1](However, if anyone makes updates of their own, please feel free to share them with me. I will upload them as Optional Files and give credit.)

[/size]

This is all my "Master Of Weapons" weapons in one esp.
So whats new since last time, you ask?

Ok im going to be honest.
Not much.
Only immersion has been improved.

First off, its just one esp.
And now *almost* everyone in-game has a weapon that suits him/her.

eg. All bards have flutes to fight with, woodcutters have saws and hooks, fishermen(bolli in Riften for eg.) have fishing rods,
necromancers (and windhelm serial killer) have embalming tools, drunkards use tankards, old ladies use brooms, etc.

####Please Endorse!####

Fishing Pole
Lumberjack's Hook
Lumberjack's Saw
Embalming Brain Pick
Embalming Scalpel
Embalming Knife
Bloody Bone
Bloody Spine
Goat Leg
Horker Tusk
Rabbit Meat
Broom
Clothes Iron
Pitchfork
Shovel
Small Shovel
Flagon
Flute
Fork
Knife
Ladle
Mead
Cast Iron Pot
Tankard
Wine Bottle



***********AS USUAL, YOU HAVE TO TAKE THE UNUSABLE ITEM TO A FORGE AND CRAFT A USABLE VERSION..****************


ENJOY!!!



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
